title: Western stories : expressions for the future
brief_description: Eight young people from Melbourne’s west share their stories of family, identity and the incidents that have changed their lives. Created as part of the Digital Storytelling program ‘Western stories: expressions for the future’ at ACMI.
description: Eight young people from Melbourne’s west share their stories of family, identity and the incidents that have changed their lives. Created as part of the Digital Storytelling program ‘Western stories: expressions for the future’ at ACMI.
